Name: Escape From The Void
About the game: Discover a new kind of VR game with full asymmetric cooperation. One of the player is lost in the void and has to rely on the other to make his way out. Communication will be your only way to escape from the void... Two player asymmetric cooperation with one computer and one VR headset 40+ puzzles to challenge your skills Local record system
